articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: SpaceX launches Europe’s Hera asteroid mission ahead of Hurricane Milton - Ars Technica
articles.description: The launch of another important mission, NASA’s Europa Clipper, is on hold due to Hurricane Milton.

articles.title: A Year With Bennu: NASA’s OSIRIS-REx Asteroid Sample Reveals Intriguing Clues to Origin of Life on Earth - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A year after receiving the largest asteroid sample via NASA's OSIRIS-REx, significant findings about early life and the solar system have been unveiled. The sample's analysis points to a water-rich origin for Bennu and opens new avenues in planetary defense a…
articles.content: The OSIRIS-REx mission’s asteroid sample offers new perspectives on the solar system’s formation and life’s origins, leading to expanded missions and enhanced planetary defense research. Credit: NASA… [+5874 chars]
